title: Refund Policy
content: Students can request a refund within 30 days of fee payment. Refunds are processed within 7 working days.

title: Attendance Policy
content: Students must maintain at least 75 percent attendance to appear for final examinations.

title: Library Rules
content: Books can be borrowed for 14 days. Late returns incur a fine of 5 rupees per day.

title: Hostel Policy
content: Hostel gates close at 10 PM. Students must carry ID cards at all times.

title: Exam Guidelines
content: Students must bring hall tickets and arrive 30 minutes before exam time.
